name: Idaho Independent Bank
description: Idaho Independent Bank is a community-focused financial institution dedicated to providing personalized banking services to individuals and businesses throughout Idaho. Established in 1993 and headquartered in Coeur d'Alene, Idaho, the bank emphasizes strong customer relationships and a commitment to the local community. With a diverse array of financial products, Idaho Independent Bank offers checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services tailored to meet the unique needs of its customers. The bank prides itself on its responsiveness and flexibility, ensuring that clients receive the support they need to achieve their financial goals. As a member of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC), Idaho Independent Bank is committed to maintaining the highest standards of financial stability and compliance. The institution is also actively involved in community development initiatives, promoting economic growth and supporting local businesses through various lending programs. With a strong focus on customer service and community involvement, Idaho Independent Bank continues to enhance its position as a trusted banking partner in the region.

seo.meta_title: Idaho Independent Bank | Community-Focused Banking Services
seo.meta_description: Idaho Independent Bank offers personalized banking services, loans, and investment solutions tailored to individuals and businesses in Idaho. Discover our commitment to community and financial growth.

faq.question: What services does Idaho Independent Bank offer?
faq.answer: Idaho Independent Bank offers a range of services including personal and business banking, loans, mortgages, and investment services.

faq.question: Where is Idaho Independent Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Idaho Independent Bank is headquartered in Coeur d'Alene, Idaho, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Idaho Independent Bank?
faq.answer: Jeffery A. Fawson is the CEO of Idaho Independent Bank.

faq.question: When was Idaho Independent Bank founded?
faq.answer: Idaho Independent Bank was founded in 1993.
